description: This source file defines a Next.js page component for a product detail view. It includes a function to generate static parameters for static site generation and a server component that passes a dynamic product ID to a client-side component. The file manages server-side rendering and client-side interactivity separation.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates a static list of product ID parameters for static page generation, producing IDs from 1 to 12.

methods.name: ProductDetailPage
methods.description: Main server component that extracts the product ID from route parameters and renders the client-side product detail component.
